mapper.insert: INSERT INTO info.checkpoint (Lat, Lon, Position) VALUES (#{lat}, #{lon}, #{position})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM info.checkpoint ORDER BY Id ASC

SELECT x.* FROM info.checkpoint x, ( SELECT a.Id FROM info.checkpoint a, info.nature_monitor_earthquakeinfo b WHERE (a.Lat-b.Lat) * (a.Lat-b.Lat) + (180-ABS(ABS(a.Lon-b.Lon)-180)) * (180-ABS(ABS(a.Lon-b.Lon)-180)) < 500 GROUP BY a.Id ) y WHERE x.Id = y.Id ORDER BY x.Id ASC

SELECT res.Id, res.Time, res.Lat, res.Lon, res.Deep, res.Level, res.Position FROM ( SELECT *, FIRST_VALUE(t.dis) OVER (ORDER BY t.dis) FROM ( SELECT b.*, (a.Lat-b.Lat) * (a.Lat-b.Lat) + (180-ABS(ABS(a.Lon-b.Lon)-180)) * (180-ABS(ABS(a.Lon-b.Lon)-180)) dis FROM (SELECT Lat, Lon from info.checkpoint WHERE Id = #{id}) a, info.nature_monitor_earthquakeinfo b WHERE (a.Lat-b.Lat) * (a.Lat-b.Lat) + (180-ABS(ABS(a.Lon-b.Lon)-180)) * (180-ABS(ABS(a.Lon-b.Lon)-180)) < 500 GROUP BY b.Id ) t LIMIT 1 ) res
SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN Id = #{id} THEN 1 END) FROM info.checkpoint
mapper.update: UPDATE info.checkpoint SET Lat = #{lat}, Lon = #{lon}, Position = #{position} WHERE Id = #{id}
